Text: why are you saying Oi for..dropkick murphys is not Oi its punk you stuped fuck
Well I know that Oi! certainly gets stated quit a bit in some of there songs.

oi = street punk 
The word Oi! is an old Cockney expression, simply meaning hey! or hello!
And Virus...grow the fuck up dude.
Dropkick Murphys OI! in the old school sense!
